languages.text: {n}Абеляр тяжело вздыхает и наклоняется к вам.{/n} "Порой информация, доходящая до отсталых миров, проходит сквозь необычайные метаморфозы в умах несчастных и прискорбно ограниченных обывателей... будьте милосерднее, Лорд-капитан, они, вероятно, действительно пытались вас порадовать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр тяжело вздыхает и наклоняется к вам.{/n} "Порой информация, доходящая до отсталых миров, проходит сквозь необычайные метаморфозы в умах несчастных и прискорбно ограниченных обывателей... будьте милосерднее, Лорд-капитан, они, вероятно, действительно пытались вас порадовать".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and leans over to you.{/n} "Sometimes, when information reaches the more backward worlds, it undergoes strange metamorphoses in the minds of unfortunate and regrettably parochial laypeople... Have mercy, Lord Captain. They probably have been trying to please you."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр тяжело вздыхает и наклоняется к вам.{/n} "Порой информация, доходящая до отсталых миров, проходит сквозь необычайные метаморфозы в умах несчастных и прискорбно ограниченных обывателей... будьте милосерднее, Лорд-капитан, они, вероятно, действительно пытались вас порадовать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and leans over to you.{/n} "Sometimes information that reaches backward worlds undergoes strange metamorphoses in the minds of unfortunate and regrettably parochial laymen... Have mercy, Lord Captain, they probably have been trying to please you."

{n}Abelard sighs heavily and leans over to you.{/n} "Sometimes, when information reaches the more backward worlds, it undergoes strange metamorphoses in the minds of unfortunate and regrettably parochial laypeople... Have mercy, Lord Captain. They probably have been trying to please you."

{n}Abelard sighs heavily and leans over to you.{/n} "Sometimes, when information reaches the more backward worlds, it undergoes strange metamorphoses in the minds of unfortunate and regrettably parochial laypeople... Have mercy, Lord Captain. They probably have been trying to please you."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德沉重地叹了口气，朝你靠了过来。{/n}“有时候，当信息抵达那些较为落后的世界，传到那些思维狭隘的庸人耳中时，便会被扭曲得不成样子，这实在是令人遗憾……请您开恩，舰长大人，这些人仅仅是想取悦您而已。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and leans over to you.{/n} "Sometimes, when information reaches the more backward worlds, it undergoes strange metamorphoses in the minds of unfortunate and regrettably parochial laypeople... Have mercy, Lord Captain. They probably have been trying to please you."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德沉重地叹了口气，朝你靠了过来。{/n}“有时候，当信息抵达那些较为落后的世界，传到那些思维狭隘的庸人耳中时，便会被扭曲得不成样子，这实在是令人遗憾……请您开恩，舰长大人，这些人仅仅是想取悦您而已。”

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは深いため息をつき、身体を寄せてきた。{/n}「後進的な惑星に情報が届くと、時として残念ながら不運で視野の狭い一般人たちの頭の中で、奇妙な変質を遂げることがあるのです…ロード・キャプテン、どうかご慈悲を。おそらく、彼らはあなたに気に入られようとしていたのでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and leans over to you.{/n} "Sometimes, when information reaches the more backward worlds, it undergoes strange metamorphoses in the minds of unfortunate and regrettably parochial laypeople... Have mercy, Lord Captain. They probably have been trying to please you."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは深いため息をつき、身体を寄せてきた。{/n}「後進的な惑星に情報が届くと、時として残念ながら不運で視野の狭い一般人たちの頭の中で、奇妙な変質を遂げることがあるのです…ロード・キャプテン、どうかご慈悲を。おそらく、彼らはあなたに気に入られようとしていたのでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Abelard suspira con pesadez y se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «A veces, cuando la información alcanza los mundos más atrasados, experimenta una peculiar metamorfosis en las estrechas mentes de los plebeyos más desfavorecidos y provincianos... Apiádese de ellos, Lord Capitán. Seguramente lo único que querían era complacerle».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and leans over to you.{/n} "Sometimes, when information reaches the more backward worlds, it undergoes strange metamorphoses in the minds of unfortunate and regrettably parochial laypeople... Have mercy, Lord Captain. They probably have been trying to please you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard suspira con pesadez y se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «A veces, cuando la información alcanza los mundos más atrasados, experimenta una peculiar metamorfosis en las estrechas mentes de los plebeyos más desfavorecidos y provincianos... Apiádese de ellos, Lord Capitán. Seguramente lo único que querían era complacerle».

languages.text: {n}Abelard, ağır ağır iç çekip sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Bazen bilgiler geri kalmış dünyalara ulaştığında talihsiz ve ne yazık ki dar görüşlü avamın zihninde başkalaşım geçirebilir... Merhamet edin Lord Kaptan. Muhtemelen sizi memnun etmeye çalışıyorlardı."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and leans over to you.{/n} "Sometimes, when information reaches the more backward worlds, it undergoes strange metamorphoses in the minds of unfortunate and regrettably parochial laypeople... Have mercy, Lord Captain. They probably have been trying to please you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, ağır ağır iç çekip sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Bazen bilgiler geri kalmış dünyalara ulaştığında talihsiz ve ne yazık ki dar görüşlü avamın zihninde başkalaşım geçirebilir... Merhamet edin Lord Kaptan. Muhtemelen sizi memnun etmeye çalışıyorlardı."

languages.text: {n}Abélard pousse un profond soupir et se penche vers vous.{/n} « Lorsque l'information parvient jusqu'aux mondes les plus arriérés, elle subit parfois d'étranges métamorphoses dans l'esprit des fidèles regrettablement rustiques... Soyez {mf|indulgent|indulgente} avec eux, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ils ne cherchent probablement qu'à vous faire plaisir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and leans over to you.{/n} "Sometimes, when information reaches the more backward worlds, it undergoes strange metamorphoses in the minds of unfortunate and regrettably parochial laypeople... Have mercy, Lord Captain. They probably have been trying to please you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard pousse un profond soupir et se penche vers vous.{/n} « Lorsque l'information parvient jusqu'aux mondes les plus arriérés, elle subit parfois d'étranges métamorphoses dans l'esprit des fidèles regrettablement rustiques... Soyez {mf|indulgent|indulgente} avec eux, {mf|seigneur-capitainelseigneure-capitaine}. Ils ne cherchent probablement qu'à vous faire plaisir. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard seufzt tief und lehnt sich zu dir.{/n} "Wenn Informationen rückständigere Welten erreichen, durchlaufen sie im Verstand glückloser und bedauerlich beschränkter Laien mitunter eine seltsame Metamorphose ... Seid also gnädig, Lord Captain. Sie wollten Euch vermutlich nur eine Freude machen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and leans over to you.{/n} "Sometimes, when information reaches the more backward worlds, it undergoes strange metamorphoses in the minds of unfortunate and regrettably parochial laypeople... Have mercy, Lord Captain. They probably have been trying to please you."

Seid also gnädig, Lord Captain. Sie wollten Euch vermutlich nur eine Freude machen."
